column4: hello everyone, i have a problem.. i'm trying to run a windows software on ubuntu using wine but it shows always on top of everything... is there a command line to minimize it in the tray icon or make it go away?

hello everyone, i have a problem.. i'm trying to run a windows software on ubuntu using wine but it shows always on top of everything... is there a command line to minimize it in the tray icon or make it go away ?
please read about that windows app in appdb.winehq.org
then you are possibly the FIRST person to run that software in Wine. so there's a reason it doesn't run well in Wine
